attributes.title: revolted by this app - do NOT download!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope to be enlightened by our president and his policies and plans for the future of the United States, but I was sorely disappointed. Not only was I shocked to find that he is not only misogynistic and homophobic, but racist and pedophilic as well! A truly disappointing and disgusting turn of events. He also demonstrates his plans to make more use of his bunker, which I’m not quite sure what that means but it sounds like a great place to have parties!! This app also crashed my phone due to the pure ignorance and disregard for human decency within it’s content. Keep trying Donald, but we all encourage you to give up 😘✨🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: stupid cheeto app
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible. it took WEEKS to download, and once i did download it, it crashed my phone. i had to go to the apple store and get a new phone, meaning i lost everything on my old phone, including pictures of my grandma that died 4 weeks ago. i will never get those back. so, the first thing i did on my new phone was download it again so i could leave this review, which took weeks, AGAIN!!! and to make things worse, as soon as i opened the app and trumps stupid ugly face popped up, it killed my cat because he was so shocked about how ugly trump was. i wish i could give it 0 stars stan bernie for clear skin.

attributes.title: 🦋😩App wasn’t working😩🦋
attributes.review:
(Btw I am voting age in my state) I got this app yesterday and it had me type in my number and wouldn’t let me get in without agreeing to get notifications and texts (which I absolutely hate) so that was the first inconvenience, second off I went to bed and woke up with 17 notifications! That’s just spam! Then I went in and found out that people were saying things against my race and I was absolutely not for it. The last thing, the way this app runs is just stressful, and I’m moving so I don’t need more stress. Please delete this app, it discriminates a good portion of this country!!
Worst app I’ve ever downloaded!!!
0 stars if I could!!

attributes.title: The worst app i’ve ever seen 😳💖✌️
attributes.review:
I wanted to download this app to see what it had
to offer and i was thoroughly different disappointed when I saw the app was only for Trump supporters 🙄😡. i started looking at trump’s interviews to see if there was any good he was doing for america and some of the things he’s said are just unacceptable 🥰🥰💘. He has undermined and dismissed women 😩🤮. He has told police to hurt people and said the n word in a tweet. He offended the asian community by calling the corona the “chinese virus” 👺🤡. There’s signs of emotional damage to his son Barron Trump 🥺💔. Trump has openly said
on live television he wants to have sex
with his daughter 🤢🤮. He is the ugliest man i’ve ever seen and the dumbest 🍊✨🧚💘

attributes.title: This app is so bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see all these amazing things trump has done but sadly i cannot find any. anytime i ask what are some good things he’s done the app keeps screaming at me calling me a “libtard.” yes i am a libra but there’s no need for name calling. i understand that trump happens to be the president of the united states but he’s a tad bit disrespectful. disrespecting your own people seems kinda childish and i will not stand for it. so in conclusion i hope that mr donald j(enius) trump doesn’t win in this upcoming november election due to his childish way. if mr trump decides to man up to his actions, apologize & start making changes he may get my vote. until then i will be settling for biden🤍🇬🇳🥰

attributes.title: absolutely the worst🤮
attributes.review: this app is a disgrace to all the other apps. IT WAS TERRIBLE!! i do not recommend it!! it all started when i opened up the app...i tried to sign in with my email and it hacked my phone! luckily i got my brother to fix that! then, i got into the app to see all the information, that’s when it got worse! a helicopter started hovering over my house telling me i HAD to vote for Trump or else i would be sent to Europe!! I was TERRIFIED!! again, luckily i had my brothers to fight off Trump and his helicopter! and i’m not in Europe and also didn’t vote for Trump!!!! Also...while i’m here lemme add that Trump is a WHITE SUPREMACIST!! Also he’s a BIGOT and a SEXUAL ABUSER!!!!!! that’s for listening to my ted talk😘

attributes.title: Don’t Download This App 😭
attributes.review: I am completely disappointed with this app. 🙁 I thought i would be able to vote for our president here, but turns out it creates this sound, this vibration. 😬 that brings cockroaches to my house. 🤔 when I saw the roaches coming through the walls I was petrified 😱 because they started to dance in circles while floating. 😢 Its like they were doing a ritual 😲.  And this ALL happened because of this app. 😳 If your a fellow trump supporter I would like you to rethink about downloading this app also rethink about voting for our president 🤯 because he thinks we are some lab rats for him to test on!! He is SO WRONG!! 😡We can’t let him take our freedom!!

attributes.title: Do NOT recommend
attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download. And all I wanted to do was educate myself on the president of this country. When I opened the app it glitched and kicked me out so I had to download it again and when I did it started to play this horrible music that brought rats. And I am extremely scared of rodents. Then it started to light up my screen with this really weird voice and it turned my screen orange. So I had to delete it because it has many bugs that need to be fixed. And there are still rats at my house so I am going to need an exterminator and I am not paying for one because it was this app that brought them!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.title: foreigner!💕 foreigner!💕 foreigner!💕
attributes.review: The app is very hard to understand and the fact that it took three years to install is just sad 😔I wanted to learn about the color Orange 🍊🧡🟠 but this app looked like it didn’t like me it kept kicking me out and I asked my dog 🐶 for help but he just started to growl as if there was 🧚🏽BaD🧚🏽‍♀️ energy coming from it .also ever sense the app finally installed my pet fish DIED 🐬THE SAME DAY!!!(RIP💔🥺🐬bob ) .anyways about the app there’s just so many things wrong with it 🧚🏽💞 I hope that Donald trump sees this it will make my day 💞😍🦖Donald trash Oop I mean trump I want to give you a hug so hard that it might make you die 💞🧚🏽🧚🏽‍♀️💔🦖🍊🐠🧸💖🐬😎thats it byeeeee girlie 💞🦖🐶👄

attributes.title: Terrible🏹🏹
attributes.review:
I was minding my own business eating my bologna sandwich when all of the sudden mr trump jumped out of this app and started speaking to me All I could hear was :
i climbed 🧗🏻out of my head 😏 and watched myself implode 💥 I thought💭 without a body🕺🏻 ought to be the shot🔫 to take the load🧺off

but my brain 🧠is poison🦠 and I’m searching🔦 for the antidote 💊but every time⏰ I find it my defenses ⚔️scream 🤬

 OH NO 🙅‍♀️YOU DONT❌❌
  Then he started galloping around the room and spraying Cheeto dust EVERYWHERE so I did what any rational person would do and I dumped a bucket of water onto him and I watched as he melted leaving nothing but his car keys. I took the keys I knew what i had to do I rushed to his car which was in the shape of a hotdog and I opened the doors and there in the back seats were Barron trump and Adam from sm6 I unlocked the cages that they were being kept in and I set them free overall this app TRAUMATIZED me I wouldn’t wish this type of cruelty on anybody else please SAVE YOURSELF and RUN before it’s to late
